parameters:
\n<Guild Master>Ah shoot! Did Lynx die? That guy was quite the earner,
really helped us out. Man, we lost a good one!

\n<Guild Master>You'll have to work hard in his place, Rui! I'm counting on
you all!

\n<Guild Master>Hey there, Rui. Seems like you use some interesting
techniques, but you're still lacking in practical
experience, right? Don't get too carried away, okay?

\n<Guild Master>You start with the lousy jobs. That's the proper order.
Don't let your guard down even if it's just against slimes.
\n<Guild Master>Hey, how was your first job?
It was tough.
It was a piece of cake.

\n<Guild Master>I see! Well, if it gets tough, just drink some booze to
reset! Huh? You can't handle alcohol?

\n<Guild Master>Hahaha! Even the late Lynx said the same thing after his
first job.

\n<Guild Master>It's a big help that you're working hard. I'm also looking
for information on your sister. Just be patient, alright?

\n<Guild Master>To talk dirty, if the reward is 10000G, you get 60%, and I
get 40%. It's a mediation fee, you know?

\n<Guild Master>Well, I'll let you drink booze or milk for cheap in return!
Don't complain, alright!

\n<Guild Master>If you want to level up, keep repeating the quest on the far
left. Monsters spawn like idiots there.

\n<Guild Master>Hey Rui, your twin is also working hard. Really helps me
out.

\n<Guild Master>What's this about always getting into lewd situations? What
are you talking about? Only succubi showing up? Eh? Humans
too?
\n<Guild Master>That's what you call a lucky streak. Good for you.

\n<Guild Master>Suddenly a flood of requests came in, right? Some are
specifically asking for you, so make sure you take care of
them. Good luck!

\n<Guild Master>Rui... could you occasionally check on the... orphanage? It
seems that Radlo guy has gone missing.

\n<Guild Master>I try to help out the kids as much as I can too. The former
Mama took good care of me.

\n<Guild Master>It's really good that you didn't catch Radlo. That he's "L"
is a secret. Don't tell anyone, alright?

\n<Guild Master>And about that Howling Stone too. It's a real pain to sell
off that stuff. I'm looking for an appraiser right now.

\n<Guild Master>By the way, that Noblesse old man asked for an escort again.
Well, just do whatever with those crappy noble requests,
alright? Don't go all out.

\n<Guild Master>Deasnote...? If I translate it directly... I don't know. The
one who wrote it probably doesn't understand either. Pfft.
All ancient script, huh? It's more than just a hassle.

\n<Guild Master>Hey hey, don't put a piano here! We don't need music in this
bar. Seriously, what kind of power are you using? It's
actually scary.

\n<Guild Master>Ho, you use a bow too? Quite skillful. Let's put an apple on
Dodon's head and see if you can aim for his face, alright?

\n<Guild Master>Poison Bullet? Did you steal that from an enemy? Rui really
is a genius. The fact that I hired you means I have good
judgment. So that makes me a genius too, right?

\n<Guild Master>Hm? That bomb... where have I seen it... Ah, no, never mind.
That's another story. It's not very powerful, is it?

\n<Guild Master>What's that? L's warning letter? Ah, right, the former boss
also... nope, never mind.

\n<Guild Master>You're equipped with a Fire Magic Book? For you, that's
quite a basic piece of equipment. You can use flashier magic
than that.

\n<Guild Master>What's up? You're wearing lipstick. Is the little one trying
to look sexy? Well, umm... yeah. (Trying to act grown-up,
huh?)

\n<Guild Master>What's up? You're wearing lipstick. No, I mean, it's an era
of diversity so I'm not saying anything... (You look
completely like a girl now.)

\n<Guild Master>Hm? Charm magic? Huh? It comes out of your butt? Ah... well,
cats do have the cutest tails after all.

\n<Guild Master>That magical power... could it be something Lynx left
behind?...

\n<Guild Master>When you work here for years, you see members come and go
many times. You become numb to feeling happy or sad about
it.

\n<Guild Master>But I haven't forgotten a single one of them. Even if they
were using fake names.

\n<Ones>Erotic monsters? What's that? Do they really exist? Yikes.
Rui, you can't lose to something like that, okay? (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>...Rui, you sometimes glance at my sister's breasts or
mine... I'm worried about you.
B

\n<Ones>Hmm, which quest should we take on? The really strong
monsters are still scary... Rui, have you decided? (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>Our first job was super easy! It was my first time defeating
a monster, but I wasn't scared at all! Really! (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>I also saw a humanoid monster for the first time... I don't
want to fight those. It's difficult, isn't it. (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>I said I wanted to fight something strong like a dragon, but
then I heard dragons aren't monsters. They're more like
spirits. But I still want to fight one! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>I shouldn't be wasting money, but I secretly bought some
strawberry macarons in the noble district Let's eat them
together later (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>This request is... kind of a hassle so pass! This one
doesn't look interesting either so pass! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>It seems like there's been an increase in lewd demons and
such recently. Is that what the Demon Lord is like? (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>I've been looking for information about my sister, but if I
become super famous instead, she'll notice me, right? I want
to see her soon! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>This one's an erotic monster too! This one as well! I can't
take it anymore! Aren't there any decent requests? Maybe we
should just clean the sewers today. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Hmm... Thinking about it again, it's no surprise that a low-
tier guild like this doesn't have many decent requests.
(Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Finally... finally my rank has reached 10! Now I feel like I
can call myself a proper adventurer! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>No more erotic monsters! Isn't there anything else? Anything
else at all!? The Demon Lord is too perverted! (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>It's been quite some time since we started coming here. I
wonder if working at such a low-tier guild will ever lead me
to my sister... (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Oh, a Death Wolf settlement. Let's go with this one-. I'll
go and annihilate them-. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Rui... how much longer do we have to work here? I'm starting
to want to go home. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Hmm, which quest should we take on? I'm still scared of the
really strong monsters... Rui, have you decided? (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>The first job was super easy! It was my first time defeating
a monster, but I wasn't scared at all! Really! (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>It was also my first time seeing a humanoid monster... I
don't want to fight those. They're hard to deal with. (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>I said I wanted to fight something strong like a dragon, but
then I heard dragons aren't monsters. They're more like
spirits. But I still want to fight one! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>I shouldn't be wasting money, but I secretly bought some
strawberry macarons in the noble district Let's eat them
together later (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>This quest is... ugh, looks like a hassle, so pass! This one
doesn't look fun either, so pass! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Apparently, there's been an increase in lewd demons and such
recently. Is that what the Demon Lord is like? (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Ones>I've been looking for information about my big sis, but if I
become super famous instead, she'll notice me, right? I want
to see her soon! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>This is another lewd monster! And this one too! Ugh, I can't
take it anymore! Aren't there any decent quests? Maybe we
should just clean the sewers today. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Hmm... Now that I think about it, it's no surprise that a
low-tier guild like this doesn't have many decent quests.
(Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Finally... finally my rank has reached 10! Now I can call
myself a respectable adventurer! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>No more lewd monsters, please! Isn't there anything else?
Anything else at all!? The Demon Lord is too perverted!
(Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>We've been here for quite some time now. I wonder if working
in such a low-tier guild will ever lead me to my big sis...
(Rank \v[269])

\n<Guild Master>Sorry for being a low-tier guild! Got nothing to say back to
that!

\n<Ones>Oh, a Death Wolf settlement. Let's go with this one-. Time
to annihilate them-. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Ones>Rui... how much longer do we have to work here? I'm starting
to want to go home. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>Erotic monsters...? What are you talking about, Rui... Do
such things even exist? (Rank )

\n<Rui>Hmm... I'll be careful. Eh? How should I be careful? Well...
how indeed?
B

\n<Rui>Which quest should I take... I need to be careful not to
overestimate my abilities. Rui, don't push yourself too
hard. (Rank )

\n<Rui>It was my first time defeating a monster, but it was nothing
special. That was less of a workout than sparring with Rui.
(Rank )

\n<Rui>Fighting humanoid monsters is... not about being strong or
weak, it's just awkward... I wonder if there will be more of
these from now on. (Rank )

\n<Rui>I heard that heroes travel with dragons! Did they tame them?
That's amazing. I'd love to meet one. They must be so cool.
(Rank )

\n<Rui>Rui! I'm going to the noble district for work, so I'll buy
some dessert and bring it back! Let's eat it together
tonight! (Rank )

\n<Rui>Hmm, I'll pass on this job. And this one too. And this and
this... They all seem kind of boring. (Rank )

\n<Rui>I went to exterminate imps, but succubi showed up instead...
It was dangerous, in various ways... I still feel weird...
(Rank )

\n<Rui>If you think about it, if we make a name for ourselves,
maybe my sister will notice us. As fellow adventurers, I
can't lose to her! (Rank )

\n<Rui>Let's see, this is succubus extermination... this one too...
succubi... Is the Demon King a pervert? (Rank )

\n<Rui>Ah, I see. This is a guild in the slums, so there aren't
many decent requests. It's too late to realize, but there
are too many jobs that aren't worth it. (Rank )

\n<Rui>I've finally reached adventurer rank 10. Feels like I'm a
mid-level adventurer now. I want to aim even higher! (Rank )

\n<Rui>Rui... (The things those erotic monsters did to me... I
definitely can't talk to Rui about that...) (Rank )

\n<Rui>Day by day, the number of jobs for succubus extermination
seems to be increasing. It looks like even the existing
monsters are becoming succubi. What is the Demon King
thinking? (Rank )

\n<Rui>Ah! Yes! A pack of Death Hounds! This is what I wanted to
do! I'll go and wipe them out! Yippee! (Rank )

\n<Rui>How long will we keep working here, I wonder. I want to see
my sister, but... time just keeps passing by... (Rank )

\n<Rui>Which quest should I choose... I need to be careful not to
overestimate my abilities. Rui, don't push yourself too
hard. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>It was my first time defeating a monster, but it was no big
deal. Training with Rui is much more of a workout. (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Rui>Fighting humanoid monsters... it's not about being strong or
weak, it's just awkward... I wonder if there will be more of
these from now on. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>I heard that heroes travel with dragons! Did they tame them?
That's amazing. I'd love to meet one. They must be so cool.
(Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>Rui! I'm going to the noble district for work, so I'll buy
some dessert and bring it back! Let's eat together tonight!
(Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>Hmm, I'll pass on this job. And this one too. And this and
this... None of them seem interesting. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>I went to exterminate imps, but succubi showed up... It was
kind of dangerous. In various ways... I still feel weird...
(Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>If we think about it, if we make a name for ourselves, maybe
my sister will notice us. As fellow adventurers, I can't
lose to her! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>Let's see, this is succubus extermination... this one too...
succubus... Is the Demon Lord a pervert? (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>Ah, I see. This is a slum guild, so there aren't many decent
requests. It's too late to realize, but there are too many
jobs that aren't worth it. (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>So I've finally reached adventurer rank 10. Feels like I'm
an intermediate adventurer now. I want to aim even higher!
(Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>Rui... (I can't really talk to Rui about all the lewd things
those monsters did to me...) (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>Day by day, there seem to be more jobs for exterminating
succubi. It looks like even the existing monsters are
turning into succubi. What is the Demon Lord thinking? (Rank
\v[269])

\n<Rui>Ah! Yes! A pack of Death Hounds! This is what I wanted to
do! I'm going to annihilate them! Yippee! (Rank \v[269])

\n<Rui>How long will we keep working here? I want to see my
sister... but time just keeps passing by... (Rank \v[269])

\n<Siebel>I heard Lynx died having sex with a monster. That guy was an
idiot when it came to that stuff... Well, it's better than
dying in pain, right?

\n<Siebel>Kitty, you shouldn't feel responsible. It'd be the worst if
you went to help and got yourself caught up in it too.
Adventurers need to be as dry as possible, or they'll die
young.

\n<Siebel>Oh! Kitty! What's that "hand" summoning thing? It's a rare
magic, isn't it? I want it too... I'd love to have my
shoulders massaged!

\n<Siebel>You know, Radlo from the orphanage keeps talking about
Kitty. They must really like Rui

\n<Siebel>Did something happen? Tell me, tell me There must be
something, right? Tell me, tell me, tell me

\n<Siebel>It seems Radlo has gone missing. I was close with that kid,
so I've been looking around... I wonder if something
happened...

\n<Siebel>In this town, disappearances aren't uncommon. I've even seen
someone who was attacked and left in the garbage dump. I'm
worried...

\n<Siebel>But the children are probably feeling even lonelier. I try
to check on them as much as I can, but Rui, if you could
help out too, that would be great?

\n<Siebel>Kitty's been working so hard that even the Master is super
happy! They say Kitty's our top earner!

\n<Siebel>If Kitty keeps doing well, we can all drink good booze I'll
be cheering for you Mwah

\n<Siebel>Did you hear? You defeated Bijou, right? That bitch is
surprisingly strong! Amazing!

\n<Siebel>But you know, that bitch Bijou holds grudges... She'll
definitely seek revenge. Be careful, okay? And I mean in
terms of chastity too.

\n<Siebel>How's it going? Getting used to it? Nfufu Have a drink with
me Oh, can't Kitty drink alcohol?

\n<Siebel>Just try a little bit of this Lick it. It's not too strong.
It's sweet and delicious, you know?
\n<Rui>Nyaa!!! Stinky!! My tongue is burning...

\n<Rui>Ugh...!!! I can't stand the smell of alcohol anymore! No, I
can't do this.

\n<Siebel>Aww Can't do it? Really can't do it? Not at all? How cute
Your nose is so sensitive

\n<Siebel>Even without Charm's magic, Rui is super charming I'm
totally smitten Nyan

\n<Siebel>Hm? What's that smell? What's that... What!? A lunch plate!?
Ew! Keep it away from me!

\n<Siebel>Eh? What's with that piano? And how are you carrying it
around? That's creepy...

\n<Siebel>That looks like an expensive plate. What's up with that? Eh?
You're going to throw it as a weapon? Kitty, you say some
weird jokes sometimes. I like that.

\n<Siebel>Isn't that lipstick Bijou's? Did you pick it up? You should
throw it away. It's dangerous. There are rumors it contains
harmful ingredients.

\n<Siebel>Oh, that chocolate pie looks delicious Can I eat it? Eh?
I'll die if I eat it? Why? A weapon? Huh?

\n<Siebel>What's with that cake? It's way too big... And it smells
like gunpowder, Kitty, that's scary. Throw it away, okay?

\n<Siebel>Is that amulet handmade by Radlo? Oh, I see That kind
of... Nice I want a lover too

\n<Siebel>Eh? The guild master? Ahh, he's not like that. He's actually
quite an old man.

\n<Siebel>Eh Wait a minute! Is that ring for real Seriously? When
did this happen...! When's the wedding? You have to invite
me!

\n<Siebel>You're blushing so much It must be super tough raising
kids, but good luck

\n<Siebel>The Phantom Thief "L" is so cool Stealing from the rich and
giving to the poor. Especially donating lots of money to the
orphanage, that's the rumor.

\n<Siebel>But I heard they got caught recently. Sigh... I admired them
so much. It's sad.

\n<Dodon>My bad! I never expected to get knocked flying by such a
tiny kitten! Hahaha! Guess I gotta get serious about
training too.

\n<Dodon>Hey, hey, is it true that Lynx is dead? That guy had the
skills to be in the top three of this guild. Guess I'm
number three now, huh.

\n<Dodon>Just kidding. Well, adventurers tend to die just like that
when their time comes.

\n<Dodon>So Latier squeezed you to death all the way in Kunes? How
erotic is that. Ah, I wish she'd drain me too.

\n<Dodon>I mean, seriously, what's so good about living? Drinking
booze, paying money, embracing women, just to distract from
the loneliness. I'm such a scumbag.

\n<Dodon>Hey, there are a ton of requests specifically asking for
you. Did you do something? It's good to be a hard worker and
all, but be careful, alright?

\n<Dodon>Eh? Sheika and Barley? I don't know them. Eh? They were at
the dance hall? Me? No way! Th-that's not it!

\n<Dodon>Even if a succubus has huge tits... Eh? How do I know
they're huge? No, seriously, it wasn't me! It's just the
character chip that's the same, right? Right?!

\n<Dodon>Yo, kitty cat. How's it going? As for me, I'm just killing
monsters and drinking booze as usual.

\n<Dodon>What's this? You're equipped with Charm's grimoire... Oh, I
don't need such a thing to... hehehe I'm totally thinking
about banging Rui
\n<Rui>Dodon... commit suicide.

\n<Dodon>What's this? You're equipped with Charm's grimoire... Hey
hey, man to man like that... No... But... You're pretty
cute... Ah, maybe it's okay...

\n<Rui>If you continue with that misunderstanding, are you okay
with dying right here?

\n<Dodon>What's with you, Rui? You're sexier than usual today. Did
you change your lipstick? It's totally my type. Don't tell
me, for me...?
\n<Rui>Dodon... commit suicide.

\n<Dodon>Rui kinda looks like a girl today. Are you wearing lipstick?
It suits you. I'm totally down for it.
\n<Rui>Stay away.

\n<Dodon>Hey, that star mark... uh, can you sell it to me? I'll pay
whatever it costs!

\n<Dodon>Are you carrying a piano around with you? That's too
monstrous, isn't it? Even I would be freaked out by that.

\n<Dodon>Eh, iron fist punishment...!? Did I do something wrong? Eat
too much? Don't hit me for something like that!

\n<Dodon>Lynx has become the wind. Become a thousand winds. He must
be blowing across that vast sky now.

\n<Dodon>Huh? Is that an "L" calling card? The current one is
apparently the second generation. I heard the first one was
quite an old lady.

\n<Kunes>Rui, huh? How does it feel to be an adventurer? You're the
youngest one here. But remember, it's not about seniority.

\n<Kunes>The strong ones are the ones who are truly remarkable. I've
been hunting monsters for a long time, but you seem
promising. Become stronger than me! I'm rooting for you.

\n<Kunes>A humanoid demon, huh... I've heard they've been increasing
lately, troublesome indeed. Never let yourself be deceived.
Their core is thoroughly evil. Let your guard down and
you'll be killed.

\n<Kunes>It's a pity about Lynx, but I'm glad you're safe. He died in
a strange way too... It's better not to remember that scene.

\n<Kunes>Damn it... I just can't shake that scene from my mind...
It's sickening...
\n<Kunes>No, it's nothing... Nothing at all...

\n<Kunes>Did that Latier manage to escape at the last second? I'll
try to find where she ran off to. I want to avenge Lynx.

\n<Kunes>Are you getting used to adventuring? Don't push yourself too
hard. You don't want to end up dying young like Lynx...

\n<Kunes>It's just not the same without him around. Hurry up and get
stronger so you can give me a run for my money.

\n<Kunes>You've equipped the Fire Magic Book, huh? That'll give you
an advantage against wind attribute types. It's also
effective against the undead. Remember that.

\n<Kunes>Equipped with a dagger, are you? Slash attacks are the same
as wind attribute. They should work well against those with
lightning attribute.

\n<Kunes>Huh? You can do martial arts too? Seems like you can do
anything. How about we have a little sparring match?

\n<Kunes>Is that stone Lynx's barrier? I see... He discarded his
power before he died. Even with such a death, did he manage
to maintain his pride in the end?

\n<Kunes>Hey, hey! Cut it out with the charm! I'm still pretty shaken
up about Lynx's situation. Seriously, what kind of gear are
you using?

\n<Kunes>Oh, that chocolate pie looks delicious! Let me have a
bite...! Mmm... It's too good!
\n<Annie>Lynx is dead, huh? Hmm...

\n<Annie>Adventurers often seem to be searching for a place to die...
Especially the ones who end up in this dump.

\n<Annie>But still... I wouldn't want them to die. Rui, you better
not die on me.

\n<Annie>You really have a cute face And you're so well-dressed. You
must be from a good family...

\n<Annie>No, my apologies for prying. Forget I said anything! This is
a place where people with reasons end up, after all.

\n<Annie>Prying into others' affairs is a no-go, as is being pried
into. But hey, let's get along! Good luck, rookie

\n<Annie>Hey there, kitty It's been a while since we started living
here, huh? You all were so tiny when you first came.

\n<Annie>Now you're still just as tiny Come here and let big sis pet
you

\n<Annie>Following Lynx, even Kunes... But you avenged them, didn't
you?

\n<Annie>Thanks. It's a job where you could die at any moment, but
there's no one who deserves to die.

\n<Annie>...Ah, well, Dodon can die for all I care. Seriously, why
won't that guy just kick the bucket!
\n<Dodon>Hey! I can hear you, Annie, damn it!

\n<Annie>Shut up! Hey! Don't raise your big fat voice at me! You
wanna go!?
\n<Dodon>...!? You gonna let me do it!?

\n<Annie>Sigh... Seriously, why did Lynx and Kunes have to die and
not this guy...

\n<Annie>As an adventurer, you're really starting to shine, Rui
Nice

\n<Annie>You're already surpassing me! I thought you were just a cute
little thing at first Well, I still do Hehehe

\n<Annie>A monster that mimicked a mother...? That's quite a heavy
request you've taken on. And they took the kid too, huh.

\n<Annie>But listening to the story, it's strange. For a monster,
it's too rational, or rather, it's beyond the level of
mimicry. The fact that it hasn't attacked the son yet is
also concerning.

\n<Annie>Maybe the mother's spirit is still lingering. Either her
soul was consumed and is being used, or her body was taken
over. It feels like one of those two.

\n<Annie>If we could just remove the monster's soul... But that kind
of high-level technique to interfere with the mind is
usually impossible. You'd need the power of a great sage or
someone of equivalent magical prowess.

\n<Annie>Hmm. Sorry! I don't know how to help. Or maybe, making the
tough choice to put her down might be a mercy too.

\n<Annie>Right now, the mother's heart is probably holding it back,
but eventually, the monster will take complete control. It's
a tough choice, but be prepared since you've taken on the
job.

\n<Annie>Yo! Kitty How's it going? Are you doing well? Sometimes you
need to take a break, you know?

\n<Annie>What I'm saying isss, let's have a drink with big sis!
Sounds good, right? Let's just skip today!

\n<Annie>Oh! That weapon is like iron-fist justice! So it's like
street fighting, huh! Nice Big sis really likes you!

\n<Annie>Wanna fight? Eh Let's fight all night long Let's
communicate with our fists! Please Hang out with me

\n<Annie>Hm? I smell something nostalgic. Is this... the wind? Heh.
It reminds me of Lynx.

\n<Annie>Oh, that's a nice blunt weapon you've got there! When you
hit a wall, it's better to smash through it rather than
going around or looking for doors!

\n<Annie>Huh? Isn't that lipstick from Bijou? Seriously, you better
not use it! It'll suck you dry to the bone. Do you know how
many people it's turned into wrecks?

\n<Annie>Hm? Rui, can you use Grave? Yeah, impact is really
something. Thrusting from below is good too!

\n<Annie>What are you doing with that charm magic book? Ha!? Did you
get yourself a crush or something!? Tell me Hey Tell me!
Is it me!?

\n<Annie>Oh, a water magic book, huh. I'm parched so give me a drink.
Eh? Can't drink it? Why? It's dirty? Is that so?

\n<Annie>What's this Star Shot thing? A technique to throw stars?
Like slinging stones? Despite its cute appearance, it's an
impact move, huh.

\n<Annie>What's with that stinky lunchbox! It smells just like the
food Lin-Tey eats! Are you sure your nose is okay?

\n<Rui>It's already numb. In fact, I can't smell anything at all.
Nothing.

\n<Bijou>So... a succubus appeared, huh. How was it? What kind of
monster was it? What did you think when you saw Lynx being
overpowered?

\n<Bijou>Don't be fooled by such a lewd monster. If you ever get in a
naughty mood, I'll take care of you

\n<Bijou>Nfufu You, with that cute face, are quite strong, aren't
you? I'm looking forward to seeing your future exploits

\n<Bijou>...(The spell to summon hands with the CF crest... It must
be a child of the Catfield family.)

\n<Bijou>(The Catfield family is a prestigious lineage among
prestigious lineages... I don't know why they would be in
such a slum... but I want to get on their good side)

\n<Bijou>Sorry, Rui When treasure is on the line, I tend to lose my
restraint I might have slashed, burned, and soaked things,
but are you okay?

\n<Bijou>Me? I'm perfectly fine Fit as a fiddle Nfufu Are you
worried about me? Thanks Mwah

\n<Bijou>Hm? What's that? Was that little bottle the content of the
treasure chest? Kind of anticlimactic, huh.

\n<Bijou>To think we solved the ruins' mystery and fought for
something like Caesar salad dressing Ahaha It was a wild
goose chase

\n<Bijou>Hm? The contents of the chest were broken? Ah, I did hit it
with an attack. There was a broken bottle with white liquid
inside?

\n<Bijou>White liquid, you say Mo- If you need white liquid, should
I let you have some? Big sis can help you out? Shall we go
upstairs?

\n<Bijou>You have the attributes of fire and wind. Judging by your
hair color, fire seems to be the stronger one. You're quite
passionate

\n<Bijou>I have both fire and water attributes. They're about equal
in intensity, so my hair is purple. There are quite a few
people whose hair doesn't show their attributes though...

\n<Bijou>We share the fire attribute They say similar attributes
mean good compatibility, so if you ever have any trouble,
feel free to rely on me anytime

\n<Bijou>Rui really is strong, huh Despite looking so cute Ufufu
Our "test of strength" was so much fun

\n<Bijou>Will you fight me again? Or maybe, since Rui seems weak to
naughty attacks... Shall we train together? Kukuku

\n<Bijou>What's the matter? Rui Do you need something from me?
Kukuku

\n<Bijou>Shall we go upstairs and do something nice? Or do you want
some medicine? Nfufu

\n<Bijou>Oh, Rui You seem to be doing well lately You've been
completing lots of requests, and everyone's talking about
you

\n<Bijou>Just between us, I have a personal request for you too
Please read the request form in front of you

\n<Bijou>Oh my That's not my lipstick Are you wearing it and
feeling like you're kissing me? Kukuku Cute

\n<Bijou>Is that a charm spell? Hmmm Planning to use that to make me
head over heels for you? I don't think your body can handle
it, but shall we try?

\n<Bijou>What's that? What are you wearing underneath? Nfufu Is that
not my underwear? Kukuku What's the matter? Going to bed?

\n<Lintei>A succubus, huh? Their combat strength isn't all that
impressive. If you take the initiative and behead them, it's
an easy victory. However...

\n<Lintei>Still, there's a certain resistance to cutting them down
since they take on a human form. That must be their intended
effect...

\n<Lintei>The Demon Lord has created quite the troublesome creatures.
Monsters that attack the mind...

\n<Lintei>Lynx... He had a weakness for women. I hope, at least, that
he passed without suffering.

\n<Lintei>You must be the rumored beast-person. It's very rare to see
one around here. This town has poor security, so please be
especially careful at night.

\n<Lintei>Thank you for avenging Lynx and Kunes. Those two were my
benefactors.

\n<Lintei>I had just arrived in these slums, only capable of studying.
They trained me in combat... and taught me how to live as an
adventurer.

\n<Lintei>Well then, I suppose I should also get to work on some
requests. Surprisingly, there are jobs that require a sharp
mind. Adventurers are jacks-of-all-trades, after all.

\n<Lintei>Sister practicing necromancy...? Why would she do such a
thing... It's hard to understand. Given her personality,
it's difficult to believe...

\n<Lintei>It's not that I doubt you. However, as a resident of Driane,
I've known her longer. There probably aren't many who would
trust you over her.

\n<Lintei>It seems you've been fulfilling requests as an adventurer.
Helping those in need brings a sense of fulfillment that
isn't just about money, doesn't it?

\n<Lintei>However, money is of utmost importance to survive here. Make
sure to find jobs that are worth your while and do your
best.

\n<Lintei>Hmm...? That stone... no, it's not a stone, is it? A clump
of wind barrier? I see, Lynx's...

\n<Lintei>He was skilled in wind barrier magic. He'd create a
makeshift shield with a barrier and then strike during the
opening. He had an interesting way of fighting.

\n<Lintei>This brings back memories. Is that weapon possibly infused
with Lynx's magical power? Even in death, some things
continue to persist.

\n<Lintei>He died soon after meeting Rui, but if he had lived, I'm
sure they would have gotten along well. Please make good use
of that magic power.

\n<Lintei>Line lightning, is it? It's a magic with excellent rapid-
fire and piercing capabilities. It should give you a
considerable advantage against water attribute foes. It
should even penetrate water barriers.

\n<Lintei>Oh, floating thunder orbs... impressive indeed. A thunder
strike with reduced firing speed has extremely high energy
efficiency.

\n<Lintei>Huh! Rui-san, you fight with your fists? With four hands,
you can go "ora ora"! I'm envious. Eh? You don't know "ora
ora"?

\n<Lintei>Is that a proliferation liquid? It's pointless to equip it
yourself. It would be better to give it to one of your hands
behind you.

\n<Lintei>To think you can even handle a bow. You've surpassed mere
dexterity. I'm really curious about the kind of training
you've undergone.

\n<Lintei>Charm magic... it seems to be highly effective on creatures
with low intelligence... but, it won't work on me! (Please
don't let it work! I beg you!)

\n<Lintei>Hm? Something smells good. Is that... a lunch plate? Ah,
it's today's lunch. Looks delicious.

\n<Lynx>Ah, the new twins, huh? I'm Lynx. Nice to meet you. The
master was really off-putting at first, right? That's just
how they are with everyone.

\n<Lynx>But once you get on their good side, they'll treat you well.
It's like that exclusive camaraderie unique to the slums,
you know? Anyway, they're not a bad person.
B

\n<Lynx>Jobs are first come, first served, so sometimes you overlap
with other guys.

\n<Lynx>Especially treasure hunting is popular. When you finally go
there, it's common to find someone has already beaten you to
it and nothing is left.

\n<Lynx>The worst is when adventurers fight over the loot. Humans
can be most cruel when money is involved. I find it
bothersome, so I just let them have it.

\n<Lynx>A real adventurer only needs enough money to drink booze and
bed a woman every now and then.

\n<Rakura>"That Lynx guy... tch. In the end, I never managed to get
back at him for running off with the win. My magic couldn't
break through his barrier even once."

\n<Rakura>"I wield lightning. He was wind. Part of it was the
disadvantage in elemental compatibility... But I just wanted
to get back at him at least once."

\n<Rakura>"This guild is a bit special, you see. We get requests that
come down from 'above.' They're sarcastically called
'Heaven's Blessings.'"

\n<Rakura>"'Jobs that the well-off guys above don't want to do' get
passed down to us. We're at the very bottom of the
adventurer's guild, after all."

\n<Rakura>"Kunes used to say 'the strong are the ones who are
respected,' but the truly strong are those who survive to
the end. The strength of an adventurer isn't just about
power."

\n<Rakura>"A truly strong adventurer is one who survives no matter
what. Even if they're dirty or pathetic, the one who stands
till the end is the one who's respected."

\n<Rakura>"Megna, that was the succubus you let escape, right? Did you
kill it? Well done. If you had killed it the first time,
there would have been fewer victims."

\n<Rakura>"You get it? Normally, you shouldn't even learn the names of
monsters. Don't talk to them. Don't show mercy. Don't give
them an opening."

\n<Rakura>"Succubi are at the bottom of the barrel when it comes to
combat ability. If you don't get seduced, they can be
finished off with a single blow. You're too soft. Remember
that."

\n<Rakura>"You're starting to get a bit of awareness as an adventurer,
aren't you? If you make a name for yourself, maybe your
sister will catch wind of your rumors. The day you'll meet
is bound to come."

\n<Rakura>"You let that succubus Megna escape? Why do you know its
name? With those kinds of creatures, you should cut their
heads off before you even speak to them."

\n<Rakura>"Don't exchange words with monsters. The more human they
look, the harder it is to kill them, but that's exactly the
strategy of the demon race. No matter how strong you are, as
an adventurer, you're second-rate."

\n<Rakura>"Have you started to take your role as an adventurer
seriously? Do you have your dog tag? It's a hassle if no one
can identify you when you drop dead."

\n<Rakura>"If you find the body of an adventurer, feel free to use
their belongings. To receive their effects is to carry on
their will. If you can afford it, bury them or take them
back home."

\n<Rakura>"Oh, that's Line Lightning. It's a magic that rapidly fires
thin bolts of lightning. Lightning attacks penetrate, so
they're strong against groups and shield bearers. It might
be difficult for someone with your fire and wind attributes
to handle though."

\n<Rakura>"Hovering Thunder Orb, huh? You've got some rare magic...
Normally, lightning is supposed to fly fast, but you
deliberately make it hover. That's quite a difficult spell,
but well done."

\n<Rakura>"Poison Gas Bullet? What's that disgusting magic? Did you
learn that from the succubus Megna? You're seriously a
genius."

\n<Rakura>"Approximately Zero Degrees? What kind of magic is that?
Does it nearly freeze things at 0C? Try a little harder."

\n<Rakura>"Oh, that's a fire magic tome. Magic that suits your own
attribute really hits different, doesn't it? It's basic but
fundamental. I'm of the lightning attribute myself, but I
think fire is cool too."

\n<Rakura>"Huh? You use Charm? Isn't that ineffective against succubi?
Might be more effective against humans though."

\n<Rakura>"You've got quite an old tome of flame magic there. Did you
pick it up from a garbage dump? Even though it's so
tattered, it still works, huh?"

\n<Rakura>"Fighting by throwing pianos? Are you out of your mind?
Apologize to music."

\n<Rakura>"I feel the power of wind. It reminds me of Lynx. Well,
sooner or later I'll have to go meet him too. That's the
life of an adventurer after all."

"Galette Cave Investigation" \C[14]Difficulty \C[1]Reward
1000G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

Reports have come in about a sweet smell emanating from
Galette Cave. Several people lured by the scent have gone
missing. Monsters have also been sighted, so please proceed
with caution.

The main tasks are to investigate the source of the smell
and exterminate any monsters. Additionally, if you find any
belongings of the missing persons, please retrieve them.

"Subjugation of the Succubus in Galette Cave"
\C[14]Difficulty  (Variable) \C[1]Reward 3000G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

In the Galette Cave, a humanoid demon calling itself Latier
has appeared. It's a type of demon known as a succubus that
seduces people and drains their vitality. It can speak human
languages, but please make sure not to be misled by it.

While succubi are often not very strong in combat, this
individual may have stolen the power of a Lynx and become
enhanced. Be very careful not to let your guard down.

"The Phantom of the Deceased Husband" \C[14]Difficulty
Survey\C[1]Reward 3500G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

I've already accepted the investigation request. First,
let's go to the church and talk to the sister. It's just
east from here.
\C[1]I'Ve Decided To Accept The Investigation Request.\C[0]
Let's check the details of the request.

About a month ago, I spotted someone near the church who
closely resembled my deceased husband.

I immediately chased after him, but due to the thick fog, I
lost sight of him and couldn't find him despite searching
for several days.

I know that the dead don't return, but I can't help feeling
concerned. Along with my anxiety, a faint hope seems to well
up in my stomach.

Even if it's just someone who looks like him, that's fine.
Could you please investigate the area around the church?
Refer to the portrait for my husband's features.

Attached is a portrait of a middle-aged man. He has kind
eyes and a wise-looking mustache. He suits a silk hat very
well.

The church is on the east side of town. Let's head there. It
might be good to start by talking to the sister.

"Phantom of the Deceased Husband" Cleared\C[14]Difficulty
\C[1]Reward 3500G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details
Challenge

Report from the guild master: A sister at the church has
been reported to be manipulating corpses using necromancy.
It's hard to believe at first...

The sister has earned the trust of the residents from the
slums. There are few, but she does have believers, and above
all, she has been contributing as a gravekeeper. Frankly,
I'm also wondering if there might be some mistake.

To receive the reward, I've reported our findings to the
female client, but whether she'll believe it or not is
uncertain. Things are getting strange.

"Notice of Intent from the Phantom Thief" \C[14]Difficulty
 Security Request \C[1]Reward 3500G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

Request from the Noblesse Count. A notice of intent has
been received from the phantom thief "L". Security is tight,
but we want to bolster our guard personnel just in case.

However, there are conditions for accepting the request. 1.
No criminal record in the past. 2. Must be well-dressed.

3. Must not be opposed to working in Rumah-Le. 4. Must
possess a certain level of skill. 5. Must be personnel who
can be recommended by the Guild Master.

To guard the noble district, it is necessary to meet the
above conditions. Details of the request will be explained
later.

Security Request\C[1]Reward 3500G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details
Challenge

It seems we've been outwitted by the phantom thief and
they've escaped, but we've been properly paid for the
security work.

Since the private soldiers bear a greater responsibility for
the escape, it appears that Count Noblesse has no complaints
against us. They would like our assistance again should
another advance notice arrive.

"My Mom Isn't My Mom" \C[14]Difficulty \C[1]Reward 1000G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

Nobody believes what I say. That person has my mom's face
but... she's not my mom.

She speaks with the same voice and says the same things...
Even though she's the same, something feels different.
Someone, please believe me.

My name is Jean. My mom is Mare. Our address is in the
eastern residential area of Rumare...

The writing looks shaky, as if written by trembling hands.
It was written on a paper airplane. It doesn't seem to be an
official request...

"My Mom Isn't My Mom"Cleared\C[14]Difficulty \C[1]Reward
1000G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details
Challenge

There's a high possibility that the mother, Mare, is a
monster in disguise. She has fled with her son Jean, but
it's likely they haven't left town. They are probably hiding
in a nearby vacant house or warehouse.

Since the details are unclear, if a hiding place is
discovered, Rui, who accepted the request, will go ahead to
check the situation. We will contact you later.

"Treasure of the Ruins' Depths" \C[14]Difficulty: 
\C[1]Reward: 2000G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

Ruins have been discovered in the forest area near Rumare.
They're infested with monsters, so we're entrusting
adventurers to investigate.

Aside from monsters like imps, slimes, and orcs, there are
also mechanical beings patrolling the ruins. Proceed with
caution.

From the Guild Master: It's your favorite treasure hunt,
folks! The treasure goes to the swift!

But hey, don't fight over it too much, okay? Killing someone
just because they found it first is not cool. Beating them
half to death is okay, though.

"Overnight Superstar" \C[14]Difficulty  \C[1]Reward 3000G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

It seems there are people causing a ruckus night after night
in a building southwest of the Driene residential area.

It would be one thing if it were just fools making noise,
but it appears that two succubi are gathering humans and
dancing wildly all night long.

It seems to be a members-only establishment with a lookout
at the entrance, so an adventurer who can sneak in nimbly
through another window or such would be suitable.

Be prepared for a two-on-one situation. Be cautious as the
charmed humans may turn against you. In the worst-case
scenario, you are permitted to kill humans who are
intoxicated with the demons.

number of humans. It seems they almost got away, but there's
still a chance.

Fools like them tend to repeat the same mistakes. Give it
some time, and they'll start causing trouble again. When
that happens, make sure to take their heads.

The analysis of the barrier set up at the church is
complete. It's only temporary, but it's possible to
deactivate the barrier and enter. If you accept the request,
we will arrange for a barrier master.

trust her. We want you to confirm whether the sister is
truly walking the path of wickedness.

It's preferable to incapacitate and arrest her, but be
prepared to kill if you feel your life is in danger.

"Infiltration of the Succubus at the Magic Academy"
\C[14]Difficulty \C[1]Reward 3000G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

It seems a succubus has infiltrated among the students of
Lumare Magic Academy. Currently, they are confined in a
classroom by a barrier spell. It appears that both the
succubus and a teacher are trapped inside.

To prevent chaos from spreading if it becomes known that a
demon has entered the town, we would like to request the
adventurers of Driane to handle the situation.

If the teacher's survival is confirmed, we will temporarily
neutralize the barrier, so please rescue them using
teleportation or a return feather. If they are already
deceased, you may leave them be.

Adventurers with fire, wind, or lightning attributes only
can accept this quest, as water attributes are repelled by
the barrier.Mixed attributes containing water are also not
allowed.

\C[1]Reward 3000G
Accept the request
Decline
Check details

There have been frequent incidents of merchants being
attacked by monsters on the bridge over the mountain path.
The creature is believed to be a superior imp that has
stolen magical power from numerous humans.

As fighting is expected to take place on unstable footing,
adventurers with good balance are recommended. Those with a
fear of heights should absolutely refrain from this task.

This is a manual about combat. (Close with Cancel)
Controls
Status Ailments
Normal Attack (Physical Damage)
Seduction Attack (Stamina Damage)
Easy Mode
Challenge

Z Key: Confirm/Press and hold for fast-forwarding events X
Key: Cancel/Open menu
A Key: Fire attacks D Key: Hold to lock direction

Q Key: Auto text advance/Change character in equipment
screen SHIFT: Walk/Shorten defeat scene animations Ctrl:
Fast skip

Certain attacks can cause status ailments. Please check the
status displayed in the upper left corner.

Heat: Ammo -1, Combat power down by 20% (Heart Mark)
Weakness: Combat power halved (ATK Down Mark) Paralysis:
Unable to attack (Zap Mark)

Slow: Fire rate halved (time until shooting) (Down Arrow)
Poison: Lose 2% HP at set intervals (Poison Mark) Deadly
Poison: Lose 4% HP at set intervals (Different Color Poison
Mark)

Status ailments can be cured by walking a certain number of
steps or using the item "Herbal Medicine". They can also be
prevented by certain equipment.

Normal attacks (like those that send out flames or
lightning) will damage your health (HP). If your health
reaches 0, you will be defeated.

There are seven types of attack bullets: "Fire", "Water",
"Lightning", "Slash (Wind)", "Blunt", "Temptation", and
"Food (Poison)".

The protagonist can reduce specific types of damage by
equipping items like clothing. (Example: Fire-resistant
clothing cuts fire damage by 20%)

Furthermore, certain attacks are more effective against
specific enemies. Choosing the right type of weapon attack
can give you an advantage in battle.

When attacking, refer to the "Combat Power" status. If the
enemy's defense is high or if there's a poor compatibility
with the attack type, it will display as miss (0 damage).

Some weapons may have a low hit rate, which will also result
in a miss.

If an enemy touches you or seduces you, you will continue to
take damage to your stamina (SP) until you shake them off.
If your stamina reaches 0, you will ejaculate and be
defeated.

If you are being seduced by a succubus or similar enemy, you
may also lose experience points at the same time. Escape as
soon as possible.

Additionally, the defeat scene changes depending on what
attack caused you to ejaculate. Try out different ways to
lose.This will result in a game over.

You can select Action Easy from the options menu to make
enemy attacks less intense and the game easier.

You can switch even during combat, so if you find it
difficult, it is recommended to switch to Easy Mode.

Also, when Action Easy is ON, a relief treasure chest will
appear at the inn. There is no disadvantage to using it.

You can fight an enemy again by accepting their request
again even after defeating them once. In some requests,
Challenge Mode will be added.

In Challenge Mode, you fight under various restrictions and
receive special rewards for winning. The restrictions are
chosen from the following:

"Premature Ejaculation (SP1)", "No Damage (HP1)", "No Cat
Borrowing", "Menu Prohibited (No item or skill use)", "Half
HP and SP", "Protagonist Attack Prohibited (Fight with only
Cat Borrowing)"

Clearing Challenge Mode does not affect progress. It's an
element for completionists, so feel free to ignore it or
proceed as you wish.
\C[1]Additional Requests Have Been Unlocked.\C[0]

From now on, the outcome of your requests will affect your
\C[14]"Karma Value (Morality)"\C[0]. For detailed
explanations, please check the book on the desk.
D

This is a guide on Karma value. (Close with
Cancel)\C[14]Current Karma Value\v[270]
About Karma Value
In the case of a bad choice

Karma value (morality) increases with good deeds and
decreases with bad deeds. (It decreases if you let a
succubus escape.)

Choices that affect Karma will be displayed in color. Also,
even if an H-scene occurs, the game will not end and you can
continue. Let me give you an example. (It doesn't change
regardless of the choice you make)
\C[10]Give in to temptation Karma -1
\C[1]Defeat them Karma +1

Karma value affects the content of conversations and the
ending. If you make a good choice, the request form will
glow blue, and if you make a bad choice, the request form's
light will turn red.

If you make the wrong choice, you can redo the request to
change the outcome.

If you make a bad choice, such as letting a succubus escape,
it may increase the difficulty of later events or result in
more victims.

In return, by going to where you let the succubus escape,
you can see special H-scenes like Energy Drain. There is no
benefit to sacrificing levels.

For a succubus, you can choose \C[14]"Go to meet"\C[0] from
the red request form to go to their location.

For characters in town, please go meet them directly. Giving
them money might lead to something good. (Or it might not)
